instructions: Tap the menu icon at the top left. Scroll to the very bottom and tap Settings . Choose your email account at the top. Tap Signature settings (iOS) or Signature (Android). On iOS , toggle the signature to the enabled/on position. Android users can skip to the next step. Enter your signature in the text area. On iOS devices, tap the back arrow to save the changes and return to the previous screen, or choose OK on Android.
